introduction.subTitle: Easily and quickly build your business presence into Facebook community!
introduction.proPoints:
- No credit card required 
- Easy setup 
- Cancel anytime
introduction.resume: Make your first steps with PrestaShop Facebook!
introduction.proPoint1Description:
Control your ad settings and business tools 
from one place.
introduction.proPoint2Description: Use data from Facebook Pixel to understand actions people take on your website.
introduction.proPoint3Description:
Manage your product catalog and 
unlock the power of ads.
introduction.proPoint4Title: Create and optimize better shopping experience
introduction.proPoint4Description: Thanks to the automatic synchronisation of the product catalogue and the mapping of your categories have an updated and more efficient Facebook catalogue.

messages.shopInConflictError: You are already connected to Facebook from another shop. At the moment, PrestaShop Facebook can only be configured on one shop. You must log out of your first shop to connect this one.
messages.unknownOnboardingError: An unknown error occurred during onboarding process. Please reload and try again.
messages.AccountsUpgradeNeededWarning:
The version of the module PrestaShop Account running on this shop (v{currentVersion}) is older than the minimum required v{requiredVersion}.

You may use PrestaShop Facebook but some features (i.e product synchronization) won't be available until you upgrade PrestaShop Account.
messages.AccountsUpgradeDone: PrestaShop Account has been successfully upgraded.
messages.EventBusUpgradeNeededWarning:
The version of the module PrestaShop CloudSync running on this shop (v{currentVersion}) is older than the minimum required v{requiredVersion}.

You may use PrestaShop Facebook but some features (i.e product synchronization) won't be available until you upgrade PrestaShop CloudSync.
messages.EventBusUpgradeDone: PrestaShop CloudSync has been successfully upgraded.
messages.EventBusInstallNeededWarning:
PrestaShop CloudSync in not installed on this shop.

You may use PrestaShop Facebook but some features (i.e product synchronization) won't be available until you install PrestaShop CloudSync.
messages.EventBusInstallDone: PrestaShop CloudSync has been successfully installed.
messages.EventBusEnableNeededWarning:
PrestaShop CloudSync is currently disabled on this shop.

Changes made on your product catalog won't be synchronized until PrestaShop CloudSync is enabled.
messages.accountSuspended: We seem to lack permissions on your Facebook account to be able to sync your products. To resolve this issue, please reonboard to put the permissions back to the correct state.

notConnected.title: Connect your store to Facebook
notConnected.description: With PS Facebook enjoy a frictionless, codeless onboarding and management experience for Facebook business products.
notConnected.details:
- Create/Select business 
- Create/Select page 
- Create/Select ad account 
- Create/Select install pixel 
 - Create/Select sync product catalog 
 - Create Facebook Shop & Instagram Shopping 
- Add Messenger plug-in in your shop

connected.description: You authorize this Facebook account to connect to your store:
connected.facebookBusinessManagerTooltip: Facebook business account allows you to manage advertising accounts, Pages and the people who work on them in the same place
connected.facebookPixelTooltip: The Facebook pixel is a piece of code (Javascript) that we automatically install on your website pages. It allows you to “track” who visits your website, track conversions of your Facebook ads and create retargeting audiences
connected.facebookPageTooltip: Your Facebook page will represent your business in your ads
connected.facebookAdsTooltip: Facebook Ads account allows merchants to access their ads management tool, to make, edit and analyze paid promotional Facebook campaigns
connected.unlinkModalText: You are about to remove Facebook Business Extension. You will no longer have access to the stored settings of Facebook.

exchangeTokens.acknowledging: Acknowledging your permissions with Facebook services.
exchangeTokens.tryAgain: Seems Facebook servers have difficulties to deliver an access to your account. Please wait a bit more...
exchangeTokens.errored: Cannot get an access to your account from Facebook servers, please try to onboard your facebook account once again. If this error persist, please contact support.

app.informationCannotBeDisplayedWarning: This information cannot be displayed at the moment

glass.text: You don’t see Facebook secured browser? We help you relaunch the window to finish configuration. You may need to activate popup windows in your browser to continue.

catalogSummary.categoryMatchingIntro: To enhance your catalog and help customers discover your items online, enter a Google product category (GPC) for your items.
catalogSummary.categoryMatchingNotice: You **must** choose at least one of these category types: 1) to use onsite Facebook checkout and 2) to enhance your catalog with category-specific attributes. Both category types are optional, but conditionally required.
catalogSummary.catalogExportIntro: Before buyers can purchase items from you, you'll need to upload your products information into a Facebook Product Catalog.
catalogSummary.catalogExportInfo:
Please be aware of the following: 
1. The export of the catalog is done once a day (during the night). 
2. It can take up to 24h for your PrestaShop product information to sync to Facebook. 
3. Only all « active » products are exported to Facebook for their base language. 
4. Only products with mandatory fields filled will be synchronized: a (short) description, a quantity, a price, a cover, a manufacturer or an ean/upc/isbn. 
5. Export of product localizations (for translations) are still in beta and could trigger some unexpected errors. 
6. Only products that have been modified will be updated in your catalog.
catalogSummary.resetExportLink: If you want to re-export your entire catalog click here.
catalogSummary.resetExportSuccess: Thank you, all the eligible products will be pushed to Facebook during the next scheduled synchronization.
catalogSummary.resetExportError: Unknown error occurred trying to reset export. Please try again later.
catalogSummary.preApprovalScanTitle: Product scan before synchronization to facebook
catalogSummary.preApprovalScanIntro: Check which products are ready to be synchronized and which ones have problems and will not be synchronized.
catalogSummary.preApprovalScanError: Something went wrong while scanning products.
catalogSummary.catalogExportWarning: Products will be exported then updated every 24h.
catalogSummary.catalogExportDisclaimer: By sharing your catalog, you agree PrestaShop may send all information related to the catalog products to Facebook.
catalogSummary.catalogExportNotice: It can take up to 24h for your PrestaShop product information to sync to Facebook.
catalogSummary.modalDeactivationText: You are about to disable your catalog sync with Facebook Business. Products will not sync until catalog export is reactivated.

syncReport.title: Product status
syncReport.name: Name
syncReport.languageTooltip: This is the language in which the error is found.
syncReport.imageTooltip: The main image of your item. Images must be in JPG, GIF or PNG format, at least 500 x 500 pixels and up to 8 MB. See product image specifications.
syncReport.descriptionTooltip: A short, relevant description of the item. Include specific and unique product features like material or color. Use plain text (not HTML) and don't enter text in all capital letters or include any links. See product description specifications. Character limit: 5,000.
syncReport.barcodeTooltip: The brand name, unique manufacturer part number (MPN) or Global Trade Item Number (GTIN) of the item. You only need to enter one of these, not all of them. For GTIN, enter the item's UPC, EAN, JAN or ISBN. Character limit: 100.
syncReport.errorTooltip: This is the error given by Facebook when trying to export the product.
syncReport.prevalidationText: Products with detected problems and which couldn't be synced are listed below:
syncReport.reportingText: Products with detected problems after catalog export are listed below:
syncReport.prevalidationEmpty: Well done! All your products are ready to be exported
syncReport.reportingEmpty: Well done! All your products have been exported to your Facebook catalog.

categoryMatching.title: Enhance your catalog : category mapping
categoryMatching.intro:
Important: 
 - The Google Category and Google Subcategory fields are mandatory for each of your PrestaShop categories 
- Category mapping is automatically saved once you have linked your PrestaShop category to a Google category and subcategory 
- Once you have mapped your categories and sub-categories, simply click on 'Go back' 
- Save time by applying your main category’s mapping to its sub-categories, by checking the 'Apply to sub categories' box

autocomplete.tooManyResults: Too many results, please complete your search.
autocomplete.fetchError: An error occurred during search process.

categoryMatching.errors: An error occurred, please update the module.

categoryMatched.title: Improve your catalog: map your categories
categoryMatched.description: To enhance your catalog and help customers discover your items online, enter a Google product category (GPC) for your items.

ig_shopping.name: Instagram shopping
ig_shopping.description: Instagram Shopping gives your business an immersive storefront for people to explore your best products.

messenger_chat.name: Messenger Chat Plugin
messenger_chat.description: The Chat Plugin allows you to integrate your Messenger experience directly into your website.

page_shop.name: Add a shop tab on your Facebook page
page_shop.description: Facebook Page shop allows you to list products you're selling and connect with more customers on Facebook.

page_cta.name: Add a button on your Facebook page
page_cta.description: Add a button on your Facebook Page to get people to take an action from your page such as your shop.

headings.availableFeatures: To boost sales, add to your shop...

warning.productsNotSynced: You first need to import your product catalog so you will be able to set up Facebook Shop and Instagram Shopping and also create ad campaigns.
warning.disableFeatureModalText: You are about to disable this feature. This may limit some functionality.
warning.noFeatures: Features could not be retrieved from Facebook. This may be caused by the token expiration and can be fixed by restarting the onboarding.

survey.title: Give us your feedback!
survey.text: Only 3 minutes to give some feedback on the configuration and use of PrestaShop Facebook!

help.needHelp: Need help? Find here the documentation of this module.
help.couldntFindAnyAnswer: Couldn't find any answer to your question?

multiShopSelector.title: Modul multimagazin activat
multiShopSelector.subtitle: Trebuie să configurezi magazinele unul câte unul pentru acest serviciu, dar vei putea utiliza același cont.
multiShopSelector.selectStore: Te rugăm să selectezi primul magazin de configurat din lista de mai jos
multiShopSelector.tips: După ce ai terminat cu primul magazin, le poți configura pe celelalte, selectându-le unul câte unul din selectorul magazinului, în meniul orizontal
